t: Amazon.com: Rons Gone Wrong Tomy, My Best Friend Ron, Interactive Toy Plush with Many Ways to Play : Toys & Games
s: My kid is happy and it lights up and sings so as long as he likes it I’m happy ... My Ron has definitely gone wrong! He can do EITHER the light modes OR the mimic mode, but not both. I have to turn him on and off to switch between modes. He mostly functions as promised, so I figure, close enough!
